pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or above (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3. Quadcore CPU or above
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or above
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or above (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5. Quadcore CPU or above
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or above
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller is highly recommended

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
